item.title: The State of the Web - A Trailer
item.description: April 22 2007 - the state of the affairs of the Web.

item.title: Algorithms or human judgement? Give me logic
item.description: In short, I'd rather get my search results from logic than the crazy fancy of a human being.

item.title: Status update on logging into my Root /Vault
item.description: Thanks to some great support, I'm now able to log in to my Vault.

item.title: Attention: Where do you put it?
item.description: In some way, I found AttentionTrust.org. Basically, AttentionTrust operates under the principle that your attention is both yours, and of worth.
